products.name: Eco-Friendly Water Bottle
products.description: A reusable water bottle made from stainless steel, designed to keep beverages cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours. It features a leak-proof lid and a sleek design, making it perfect for on-the-go hydration.

products.name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Over-ear wireless headphones with noise cancellation technology, offering high-fidelity sound and a comfortable fit for all-day wear. They come with a built-in microphone for hands-free calling and a battery life of up to 30 hours.

products.name: Organic Cotton Tote Bag
products.description: A stylish and durable tote bag made from 100% organic cotton. Perfect for shopping, beach trips, or everyday use, it features reinforced handles and a spacious interior.

products.name: Smart Fitness Tracker
products.description: A sleek fitness tracker that monitors heart rate, sleep patterns, and daily activity. It syncs with your smartphone for detailed stats and comes with a built-in GPS.

products.name: Portable Solar Charger
products.description: A compact solar charger for mobile devices, perfect for outdoor activities and travel. It features multiple USB ports and a high-efficiency solar panel.

products.name: Bamboo Toothbrush Set
products.description: A set of eco-friendly bamboo toothbrushes with soft bristles. The biodegradable handles are designed for comfort and sustainability.

products.name: Travel Neck Pillow
products.description: A memory foam neck pillow designed for comfort during travel. It provides ergonomic support and features a washable cover.

products.name: Organic Herbal Tea Set
products.description: A selection of organic herbal teas, including chamomile, peppermint, and green tea. Each blend is carefully crafted for relaxation and wellness.
